article.title: Booz Allen Hamilton Receives Navy Contract for Technical and Engineering Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Booz Allen Hamilton is being awarded a $17.4 million cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for technical and engineering services for communications-electronics advanced technology systems supporting the special communications requirements division of the Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, St. Inigoes, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
